title: Coal Black and de Sebben Dwarfs

sources.title: Coal Black and de Sebben Dwarfs (1943)
sources.description: Spoof of Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937) with an all-black cartoon cast. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/coal-black-and-de-sebben-dwarfs-1943/

metadata.Plot: Spoof of 'Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)' with an all-black cartoon cast. Many WWII references, including rationing (the evil Queen is a hoarder of sugar and rubber tires) and Jeep vehicles (the Sebben Dwarfs come to the rescue in three of them). Also spoofs the extreme close-up of Kane's lips uttering "Rosebud" in 'Citizen Kane (1941)'.
metadata.Writer: Warren Foster, Jacob Grimm, Wilhelm Grimm
metadata.Actors: Ivie Anderson, Mel Blanc, Ruby Dandridge
